FocusListener, EventListener, SynthConstants, ViewFactory, sun.swing.plaf.synth.SynthUI
public class SeaGlassPasswordFieldUI
extends SeaGlassTextFieldUI

Sea Glass PasswordField UI delegate.

Based on SynthPasswordTextFieldUI, but needs to extend SeaGlassTextFieldUI instead.
